inclusion.criterion: active CSU for at least 4 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least one course of steroids
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ECG and QT parameters will be measured for further analysis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female subjects who are postmenopausal or surgically sterilized
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential with negative pregnancy test and willing to use contraception
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female subjects who are not breast-feeding
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject able to provide written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other chronic dermatological conditions under active treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Active consumption of illicit drugs including cannabis or derivatives for at least three months prior to the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with significant cardiac, respiratory or active malignance disease (except Basel Cell Carcinoma) comorbidities
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any uncontrolled infection at time of registration
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient who is taking immunomodulatory medications for other indication
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Pt has a history of systemic mastocytosis with flares, but responded well to treatment. She failed aspirin challenge due to adverse reaction.
